resources.string: Are you sure you want to quit?
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW013-SB use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW013-SB use the bluetooth and location permission
LW013-SB requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW013-SB cannot be used normally.
After that, LW013-SB could search and connect with the device
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW013-SB use the Location permission
LW013-SB requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW013-SB cannot be used normally.
LW013-SB requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW013-SB cannot be used normally.
*After replace with the new battery, need to click \"Reset\", otherwise the low power prompt will be unnormal.
